Package cryptoTrader.utils

Class TradingBroker

java.lang.Object
cryptoTrader.utils.TradingBroker
public class TradingBroker
extends java.lang.Object
Class that creates trading brokers Each broker is unique and can make many trades using varying strategies
Author:
Vicky Jiang, Ian Guenther Green
